project_descr: BARRIER REMOVAL TO SECURE PV MARKET PENETRATION IN SEMI-URBAN SUDAN (PIMS 219 CC MSP)

outputs.output_descr: The Barrier Removal to Secure PV Market Penetration in Semi-Urban Sudan, PVP, is a joint UNDP, GEF and GoS executed by the Ministry of Energy and Mining of Sudan During the period November 1999 to December 2005, for the removal of barriers in terms of strengthening the Institutional and technical capabilities of GoS and other relevant stakeholders as well as building sustainable financing modalities and assisting building policy framework that are favorable to the widespread use of PV technology in Sudan.
